claim.text: - **Physical Activity**: Encourage Alice to incorporate regular aerobic exercise (like brisk walking, cycling, or swimming) to help improve her VO2 max.
claim.speaker: Health Advocate
claim.context_before: This will help identify patterns and areas for improvement.
claim.context_after: - **Nutrition**: Focus on a heart-healthy diet rich in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and healthy fats to help reduce LDL levels.
